about_the_game:
Create the ultimate scare-sperience in You Can’t Scare Me - a haunted house game where you can scare or be scared!  Team up to scare your friends - or your friends can try to scare you!

Explore 8 creepy levels to find hidden treasures.  Set scary traps to frighten your friends - and get points if they scream!  Stay invisible and stage creepy encounters all around them - or appear in front of them as a terrifying monster to make them really flip their lid!

Can you freak out your friend enough to reduce them to a shadow of their former selves? Can your friend keep their cool long enough to find the hidden keys and escape the horrible nightmare you’ve crafted for them??

Find out - in You Can’t Scare Me!

Features:

-Multiplayer Mode - Play with up to 4 friends online

-Single Player Mode - Play against the computer

-Party Mode - Set up a level, and pass the headset to a friend to play it

-8 freaky levels including an abandoned theme park, empty hospital, liminal spaces, and more

-8 bone-chilling costumes

-50 scare traps, from unnerving to positively horrifying

content_descriptors.notes: Players can be attacked by monsters and blood is displayed on screen.  Some of the game art may be disturbing.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1, Windows 8.1 or later, Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • VR Support: SteamVR. Standing or Room Scale

short_description: Scare or be scared in You Can't Scare Me - the VR haunted house where you can frighten your friends! Set scary traps or transform into terrible monsters to try and scare the living daylights out of your friends. If they scream, you win!
